name: Deadblast
description:
Deadblast is an autobatler where the levels are built like puzzles. At each level, you have to defeat different enemies with different behaviors and attacks. Before the start of the battle, you can set up units of your units for gold, which have different attacks. Some enemies attack by area, some slow down, and some attack by magic. Your units also have different characteristics. Arrange the warriors correctly to defeat the enemy!

-Beautiful graphics
-Dynamic gameplay
-Dangerous enemies
